name: jest_introduction
description: - [ ] Set up a new **npm package** with default values with the command `npm init -y` - [ ] Install **Jest** with the command `npm i --save-dev jest` - [ ] Update the **test script** in `package.json` to          ```         "scripts": {             "test": "jest"         }         ``` - [ ] Run **Jest tests** with `npm test` (run will fail with *No tests found, exiting with code 1* until tests are written)
